content:
I mean,
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
do you like taking walks by the sea?
So I use my shellfish tongs to catch them and see who's faster, hehe!

How's the beachcombing going?
I just saw a <color=#97c344>lobster</color> dart into hiding,
its reaction was even quicker than mine!

<color=#38b6c5>Press and hold the left mouse button</color> to slowly approach...
Take aim at your target, and strike when you <color=#38b6c5>release the left button</color>!
Then you'll see it thrashing about wildly!

The seashells washed up on the shore,
Hey Glenn, those can be collected too!

After that? I just let 'em go.
But the next time,
they still shake their pincers at me!

Picking up seashells on the beach, enjoying the sea breeze...
And then running a hundred laps at full speed!

Now's your chance, dive in with those shellfish tongs!
You might catch an adorable little friend with wiggling claws!
Do you have your shellfish tongs with you? Want to give it a try?

When I patrol along the coast,
those little crabs like to wave their pincers around,
acting all tough and mighty.

So when it comes to catching rare little critters like <color=#97c344>lobsters</color>,
timing is everything.

I love watching little crabs scurrying along the shore,
Here's the trick - they may run fast,
but they get tired after a while and slow down!

Oh, I know!
They're just playing a game with me to see who's the fastest!
